cuttingActions.cut-tooltip: Split the segment at the current scrubber position
cuttingActions.cut-tooltip-aria: Cut. Split the segment at the current scrubber position
cuttingActions.delete-restore-tooltip: Mark or unmark the segment at the current position as to be deleted.
cuttingActions.delete-restore-tooltip-aria: Delete and Restore. Mark or unmark the segment at the current position as to be deleted.
cuttingActions.mergeLeft-tooltip: Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its left
cuttingActions.mergeLeft-tooltip-aria: Merge Left. Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its left
cuttingActions.mergeRight-tooltip: Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its right
cuttingActions.mergeRight-tooltip-aria: Merge Right. Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its right

video.previewButton-on-tooltip: Skips deleted segments when playing the video. Currently on
video.previewButton-off-tooltip: Skips deleted segments when playing the video. Currently off
video.comError-text: A problem occured during communication with Opencast.
video.loadError-text: An error has occured loading this video.

save.info-text: The video will not be processed but all cutting information will be stored in Opencast. You can continue your edit later.

discard.info-text: Discard all the changes you made? This cannot be undone!

theEnd.discarded-text: All your changes are now lost forever. You can now close the editor.
theEnd.startOver-tooltip: Reload the page to start over
theEnd.info-text: Changes successfully saved to Opencast. Processing your changes may take up to {{duration}} hours. You can now close the editor.

workflowSelection.noWorkflows-text: A problem occured, there are no workflows to process your changes with.<3/> Please save your changes and contact an Opencast Administrator.
workflowSelection.oneWorkflow-text: The video will be cut and processed with the workflow \"{{workflow}}\". <3/> This will take some time.
workflowSelection.manyWorkflows-text: Select which workflow Opencast should use for processing.

timeline.scrubber-deleted-text-aria: Scrubber. {{currentTime}}. Active segment: {{segment}}. Deleted. Controls: Alt+j and Alt+l to move the scrubber. Alt+i and Alt+k to increase/decrase the move delta.
timeline.scrubber-alive-text-aria: Scrubber. {{currentTime}}. Active segment: {{segment}}. Alive. Controls: Alt+j and Alt+l to move the scrubber. Alt+i and Alt+k to increase/decrase the move delta.

metadata.submit-helpertext:
Make changes as you like, then hit the {{buttonName}} button.
Note that you will still have to start processing for your changes to take effect.

various.error-text: An error has occured. Please wait a bit and try again.
